PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08192022-06-24,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC, 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to (1) add one waterbody to Schedule 2, designating it as a tailings impoundment area; and (2) correct a minor error found in the text of section 14.1 of the regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0159 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to (1) add one waterbody to Schedule 2, designating it as a tailings impoundment area; and (2) correct a minor error found in the text of section 14.1 of the regulations.
